program random_tournament
  implicit none
  integer :: n, a(2000,2000) = 0, i, j, k, d, ans = 0
  logical :: dpl(2000,2000) = .false., dpr(2000,2000) = .false.
  character(2000) :: s
  read(*,*) n
  do i = 2, n
    read(*,*) s
    do j = 1, i-1
      a(i,j) = ichar(s(j:j))-48
      a(j,i) = 1-a(i,j)
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n
    dpl(i,i) = .true.
    dpr(i,i) = .true.
  end do
  do d = 1, n-1
    do i = 1, n-d
      j = i+d
      do k = i, j
        if (k /= i) dpl(i,j) = dpl(i,j) .or. (a(i,k) == 1 .and. dpl(k,j) .and. dpr(k,i+1))
        if (k /= j) dpr(j,i) = dpr(j,i) .or. (a(k,j) == 0 .and. dpl(k,j-1) .and. dpr(k,i))
      end do
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n
    if (dpl(i,n) .and. dpr(i,1)) ans = ans+1
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') ans
end program random_tournament

module mod_bitset
  implicit none
  integer, private, parameter :: address_bits_per_word = 6
  integer, private, parameter :: bits_per_word = lshift(1, address_bits_per_word)
  integer, private, parameter :: bit_index_mask = bits_per_word - 1
  integer(8), private, parameter :: word_mask = -1
  type t_bitset
    integer(8), private, allocatable :: words(:) ! 0-indexed, [start, end)
    integer, private :: words_in_use = 0
  contains
    procedure, private :: flip0
    procedure, private :: flip1
    generic :: flip => flip0, flip1
    procedure, private :: set0
    procedure, private :: set1
    procedure, private :: setval0
    procedure, private :: setval1
    generic :: set => set0, set1, setval0, setval1
    procedure, private :: clear0
    procedure, private :: clear1
    procedure, private :: clear2
    generic :: clear => clear0, clear1, clear2
    procedure, private :: get0
    procedure, private :: get1
    generic :: get => get0, get1
    procedure :: next_set_bit => next_set_bit
    procedure :: next_clear_bit => next_clear_bit
    procedure :: previous_set_bit => previous_set_bit
    procedure :: previous_clear_bit => previous_clear_bit
    procedure :: length => length
    procedure :: is_empty => is_empty
    procedure :: is_not_empty => is_not_empty
    procedure :: intersects => intersects
    procedure :: cardinality => cardinality
    procedure :: and => and0
    procedure :: or => or0
    procedure :: xor => xor0
    procedure :: and_not => and_not0
    procedure :: size => size0
  end type
  interface bitset
    module procedure :: newb0, newb3
  end interface bitset
  interface slshift
    module procedure :: slshift0, slshift1
  end interface slshift
  interface urshift
    module procedure :: urshift0, urshift1
  end interface urshift
contains
  integer function slshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end
  integer(8) function slshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end
  integer function urshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 31), m - 1)
    end if
  end
  integer(8) function urshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 63), m - 1)
    end if
  end
  integer function number_of_leading_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 1
    x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    if (x == 0) then
      res = res + 32
      x = int(i)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 16) == 0) then
      res = res + 16
      x = lshift(x, 16)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 24) == 0) then
      res = res + 8
      x = lshift(x, 8)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 28) == 0) then
      res = res + 4
      x = lshift(x, 4)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 30) == 0) then
      res = res + 2
      x = lshift(x, 2)
    end if
    res = res - urshift(x, 31)
  end
  integer function number_of_trailing_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x, y
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 63
    y = int(i)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 32
      x = y
    else
      x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    end if
    y = lshift(x, 16)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 16
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 8
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 4
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 2
      x = y
    end if
    res = res - urshift(lshift(x, 1), 31)
  end
  integer function words_index(bit_index) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    res = rshift(bit_index, address_bits_per_word)
  end
  subroutine assert(flag, message)
    logical, intent(in) :: flag
    character(*), intent(in), optional :: message
    if (flag) return
    write(*,*) "*** Error occurred ***"
    if (present(message)) write(*,'(a)') message
    stop
  end
  subroutine check_invariants(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    n = size(this%words)
    if (u /= 0) call assert(this%words(u - 1) /= 0, "At check_invariants() (1)")
    call assert(u >= 0 .and. u <= n, "At check_invariants() (2)")
    if (u /= n) call assert(this%words(u) == 0, "At check_invariants() (3)")
  end
  subroutine recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer :: i
    do i = this%words_in_use - 1, 0, -1
      if (this%words(i) /= 0) then
        this%words_in_use = i + 1
        return
      end if
    end do
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end
  subroutine init_words(this, nbits)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    if (allocated(this%words)) deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:words_index(nbits - 1)))
    this%words = 0
  end
  type(t_bitset) function newb0() result(res)
    call init_words(res, bits_per_word)
  end
  type(t_bitset) function newb1(nbits) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    call assert(nbits >= 0, "nbits < 0 at newb1()")
    call init_words(res, nbits)
  end
  type(t_bitset) function newb2(words) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: words(:)
    allocate(res%words(0:size(words) - 1))
    res%words = words
    res%words_in_use = size(words)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end
  type(t_bitset) function newb3(longs) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: longs(:)
    integer :: i
    do i = size(longs), 1, -1
      if (longs(i) /= 0) then
        res = newb2(longs(1:i))
        return
      end if
    end do
    res = newb0()
  end
  subroutine ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: words_required
    integer :: request
    integer(8), allocatable :: copy(:)
    if (size(this%words) >= words_required) return
    request = max(2 * size(this%words), words_required)
    allocate(copy(size(this%words)))
    copy = this%words
    deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:request - 1))
    this%words = 0
    this%words(0:size(copy) - 1) = copy
  end
  subroutine expand_to(this, word_index)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: word_index
    integer :: words_required
    words_required = word_index + 1
    if (this%words_in_use < words_required) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
      this%words_in_use = words_required
    end if
  end
  subroutine check_range(from_index, to_index)
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    call assert(0 <= from_index .and. from_index <= to_index, "At check_range()")
  end
  subroutine flip0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at flip0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = xor(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine flip1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask
    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return
    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)
    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)
      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), word_mask)
      end do
      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine set0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at set0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = or(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine clear0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at clear0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) return
    this%words(word_index) = and(this%words(word_index), not(slshift(1_8, bit_index)))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine setval0(this, bit_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set0(this, bit_index)
    else
      call clear0(this, bit_index)
    end if
  end
  subroutine set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask
    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return
    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)
    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)
      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = word_mask
      end do
      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine clear1(this, from_index, to_index_)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_
    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return
    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    if (start_word_index >= this%words_in_use) return
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    if (end_word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      to_index = length(this)
      end_word_index = this%words_in_use - 1
    end if
    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask)))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(first_word_mask))
      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = 0
      end do
      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(last_word_mask))
    end if
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine setval1(this, from_index, to_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    else
      call clear1(this, from_index, to_index)
    end if
  end
  subroutine clear2(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(out) :: this
    this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1) = 0
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end
  logical function get0(this, bit_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at get0()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = .false.
      return
    end if
    res = and(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index)) /= 0
  end
  type(t_bitset) function get1(this, from_index, to_index_) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index, len
    integer :: target_words, source_index, idx
    logical :: word_aligned
    integer(8) :: last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_
    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    call check_invariants(this)
    len = length(this)
    if (len <= from_index .or. from_index == to_index) then
      res = newb0()
      return
    end if
    if (to_index > len) to_index = len
    res = newb1(to_index - from_index)
    target_words = words_index(to_index - from_index - 1) + 1
    source_index = words_index(from_index)
    word_aligned = and(from_index, bit_index_mask) == 0
    do idx = 0, target_words - 2
      if (word_aligned) then
        res%words(idx) = this%words(source_index)
      else
        res%words(idx) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), slshift(this%words(source_index + 1), -from_index))
      end if
      source_index = source_index + 1
    end do
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (and(to_index - 1, bit_index_mask) < and(from_index, bit_index_mask)) then
      res%words(target_words - 1) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), &
        slshift(and(this%words(source_index + 1), last_word_mask), -from_index))
    else
      res%words(target_words - 1) = urshift(and(this%words(source_index), last_word_mask), from_index)
    end if
    res%words_in_use = target_words
    call recalculate_words_in_use(res)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end
  integer function next_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_set_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), slshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end
  integer function next_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_clear_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), slshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = this%words_in_use * bits_per_word
        return
      end if
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end
  integer function previous_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_set_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = length(this) - 1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end
  integer function previous_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_clear_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end
  integer function length(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    if (u == 0) then
      res = 0
    else
      n = number_of_leading_zeros(this%words(u - 1))
      res = bits_per_word * (u - 1) + (bits_per_word - n)
    end if
  end
  logical function is_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use == 0
  end
  logical function is_not_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use > 0
  end
  logical function intersects(this, other) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: m, i
    m = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = m, 0, -1
      if (and(this%words(i), other%words(i)) /= 0) then
        res = .true.
      end if
    end do
    res = .false.
  end
  integer function cardinality(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = sum(popcnt(this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1)))
  end
  subroutine and0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    do while (this%words_in_use > other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(this%words_in_use) = 0
    end do
    do i = 0, this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine or0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = or(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine xor0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = xor(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  subroutine and_not0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), not(other%words(i)))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end
  integer function size0(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = size(this%words) * bits_per_word
  end
end module mod_bitset
program random_tournament
  use mod_bitset
  implicit none
  type(t_bitset) :: a(0:2000), dpl(0:2000), dpr(0:2000), tmp
  integer :: n, i, j, l, r
  character(2000) :: s
  read(*,*) n
  do i = 0, n - 1
    a(i) = bitset()
    dpl(i) = bitset()
    dpr(i) = bitset()
    call dpl(i)%set(i)
    call dpr(i)%set(i)
    if (i == 0) cycle
    read(*,'(a)') s
    do j = 0, i - 1
      call a(i)%set(j, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '1')
      call a(j)%set(i, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '0')
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n - 1
    do l = 0, n - i - 1
      r = l + i
      tmp = a(r)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r - 1))
      tmp = tmp%get(l, r)
      call dpl(l)%set(r, tmp%is_not_empty())
      tmp = a(l)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l + 1))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r))
      tmp = tmp%get(l + 1, r + 1)
      call dpr(r)%set(l, tmp%is_not_empty())
    end do
  end do
  j = 0
  do i = 0, n - 1
    if (dpl(0)%get(i) .and. dpr(n - 1)%get(i)) j = j + 1
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') j
end program random_tournament

module mod_bitset
  implicit none
  integer, private, parameter :: address_bits_per_word = 6
  integer, private, parameter :: bits_per_word = lshift(1, address_bits_per_word)
  integer, private, parameter :: bit_index_mask = bits_per_word - 1
  integer(8), private, parameter :: word_mask = -1

  type t_bitset
    integer(8), private, allocatable :: words(:) ! 0-indexed, [start, end)
    integer, private :: words_in_use = 0
  contains
    procedure, private :: flip0
    procedure, private :: flip1
    generic :: flip => flip0, flip1
    procedure, private :: set0
    procedure, private :: set1
    procedure, private :: setval0
    procedure, private :: setval1
    generic :: set => set0, set1, setval0, setval1
    procedure, private :: clear0
    procedure, private :: clear1
    procedure, private :: clear2
    generic :: clear => clear0, clear1, clear2
    procedure, private :: get0
    procedure, private :: get1
    generic :: get => get0, get1
    procedure :: next_set_bit => next_set_bit
    procedure :: next_clear_bit => next_clear_bit
    procedure :: previous_set_bit => previous_set_bit
    procedure :: previous_clear_bit => previous_clear_bit
    procedure :: length => length
    procedure :: is_empty => is_empty
    procedure :: is_not_empty => is_not_empty
    procedure :: intersects => intersects
    procedure :: cardinality => cardinality
    procedure :: and => and0
    procedure :: or => or0
    procedure :: xor => xor0
    procedure :: and_not => and_not0
    procedure :: size => size0
  end type

  interface bitset
    module procedure :: newb0, newb3
  end interface bitset

  interface slshift
    module procedure :: slshift0, slshift1
  end interface slshift

  interface urshift
    module procedure :: urshift0, urshift1
  end interface urshift

contains

  integer function slshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end

  integer(8) function slshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end

  integer function urshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 31), m - 1)
    end if
  end

  integer(8) function urshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 63), m - 1)
    end if
  end

  integer function number_of_leading_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 1
    x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    if (x == 0) then
      res = res + 32
      x = int(i)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 16) == 0) then
      res = res + 16
      x = lshift(x, 16)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 24) == 0) then
      res = res + 8
      x = lshift(x, 8)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 28) == 0) then
      res = res + 4
      x = lshift(x, 4)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 30) == 0) then
      res = res + 2
      x = lshift(x, 2)
    end if
    res = res - urshift(x, 31)
  end

  integer function number_of_trailing_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x, y
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 63
    y = int(i)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 32
      x = y
    else
      x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    end if
    y = lshift(x, 16)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 16
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 8
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 4
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 2
      x = y
    end if
    res = res - urshift(lshift(x, 1), 31)
  end

  integer function words_index(bit_index) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    res = rshift(bit_index, address_bits_per_word)
  end

  subroutine assert(flag, message)
    logical, intent(in) :: flag
    character(*), intent(in), optional :: message
    if (flag) return
    write(*,*) "*** Error occurred ***"
    if (present(message)) write(*,'(a)') message
    stop
  end

  subroutine check_invariants(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    n = size(this%words)
    if (u /= 0) call assert(this%words(u - 1) /= 0, "At check_invariants() (1)")
    call assert(u >= 0 .and. u <= n, "At check_invariants() (2)")
    if (u /= n) call assert(this%words(u) == 0, "At check_invariants() (3)")
  end

  subroutine recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer :: i
    do i = this%words_in_use - 1, 0, -1
      if (this%words(i) /= 0) then
        this%words_in_use = i + 1
        return
      end if
    end do
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end

  subroutine init_words(this, nbits)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    if (allocated(this%words)) deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:words_index(nbits - 1)))
    this%words = 0
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb0() result(res)
    call init_words(res, bits_per_word)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb1(nbits) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    call assert(nbits >= 0, "nbits < 0 at newb1()")
    call init_words(res, nbits)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb2(words) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: words(:)
    allocate(res%words(0:size(words) - 1))
    res%words = words
    res%words_in_use = size(words)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb3(longs) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: longs(:)
    integer :: i
    do i = size(longs), 1, -1
      if (longs(i) /= 0) then
        res = newb2(longs(1:i))
        return
      end if
    end do
    res = newb0()
  end

  subroutine ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: words_required
    integer :: request
    integer(8), allocatable :: copy(:)
    request = max(2 * size(this%words), words_required)
    allocate(copy(size(this%words)))
    copy = this%words
    deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:request - 1))
    this%words = 0
    this%words(0:size(copy) - 1) = copy
  end

  subroutine expand_to(this, word_index)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: word_index
    integer :: words_required
    words_required = word_index + 1
    if (this%words_in_use < words_required) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
      this%words_in_use = words_required
    end if
  end

  subroutine check_range(from_index, to_index)
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    call assert(0 <= from_index .and. from_index <= to_index, "At check_range()")
  end

  subroutine flip0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at flip0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = xor(this%words(word_index), lshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine flip1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)

    first_word_mask = lshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), word_mask)
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if

    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine set0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at set0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = or(this%words(word_index), lshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at clear0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) return
    this%words(word_index) = and(this%words(word_index), not(lshift(1_8, bit_index)))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine setval0(this, bit_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set0(this, bit_index)
    else
      call clear0(this, bit_index)
    end if
  end

  subroutine set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)

    first_word_mask = lshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = word_mask
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if

    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear1(this, from_index, to_index_)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    if (start_word_index >= this%words_in_use) return

    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    if (end_word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      to_index = length(this)
      end_word_index = this%words_in_use - 1
    end if

    first_word_mask = lshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask)))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(first_word_mask))

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = 0
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(last_word_mask))
    end if

    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine setval1(this, from_index, to_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    else
      call clear1(this, from_index, to_index)
    end if
  end

  subroutine clear2(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(out) :: this
    this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1) = 0
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end

  logical function get0(this, bit_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at get0()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = .false.
      return
    end if
    res = and(this%words(word_index), lshift(1_8, bit_index)) /= 0
  end

  type(t_bitset) function get1(this, from_index, to_index_) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index, len
    integer :: target_words, source_index, idx
    logical :: word_aligned
    integer(8) :: last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    call check_invariants(this)
    len = length(this)
    if (len <= from_index .or. from_index == to_index) then
      res = newb0()
      return
    end if

    if (to_index > len) to_index = len
    res = newb1(to_index - from_index)
    target_words = words_index(to_index - from_index - 1) + 1
    source_index = words_index(from_index)
    word_aligned = and(from_index, bit_index_mask) == 0

    do idx = 0, target_words - 2
      if (word_aligned) then
        res%words(idx) = this%words(source_index)
      else
        res%words(idx) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), slshift(this%words(source_index + 1), -from_index))
      end if
      source_index = source_index + 1
    end do

    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (and(to_index - 1, bit_index_mask) < and(from_index, bit_index_mask)) then
      res%words(target_words - 1) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), &
        slshift(and(this%words(source_index + 1), last_word_mask), -from_index))
    else
      res%words(target_words - 1) = urshift(and(this%words(source_index), last_word_mask), from_index)
    end if

    res%words_in_use = target_words
    call recalculate_words_in_use(res)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end

  integer function next_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_set_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), lshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  integer function next_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_clear_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), lshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = this%words_in_use * bits_per_word
        return
      end if
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end

  integer function previous_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_set_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = length(this) - 1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  integer function previous_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_clear_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end

  integer function length(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    if (u == 0) then
      res = 0
    else
      n = number_of_leading_zeros(this%words(u - 1))
      res = bits_per_word * (u - 1) + (bits_per_word - n)
    end if
  end

  logical function is_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use == 0
  end

  logical function is_not_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use > 0
  end

  logical function intersects(this, other) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: m, i
    m = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = m, 0, -1
      if (and(this%words(i), other%words(i)) /= 0) then
        res = .true.
      end if
    end do
    res = .false.
  end

  integer function cardinality(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = sum(popcnt(this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1)))
  end

  subroutine and0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    do while (this%words_in_use > other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(this%words_in_use) = 0
    end do
    do i = 0, this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine or0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = or(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine xor0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = xor(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine and_not0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), not(other%words(i)))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  integer function size0(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = size(this%words) * bits_per_word
  end

end module mod_bitset
program random_tournament
  use mod_bitset
  implicit none
  type(t_bitset) :: a(0:2000), dpl(0:2000), dpr(0:2000), tmp
  integer :: n, i, j, l, r
  character(2000) :: s
  read(*,*) n
  do i = 0, n - 1
    a(i) = bitset()
    dpl(i) = bitset()
    dpr(i) = bitset()
    call dpl(i)%set(i)
    call dpr(i)%set(i)
    if (i == 0) cycle
    read(*,*) s
    do j = 0, i - 1
      call a(i)%set(j, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '1')
      call a(j)%set(i, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '0')
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n - 1
    do l = 0, n - i - 1
      r = l + i
      tmp = a(r)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r - 1))
      tmp = tmp%get(l, r)
      call dpl(l)%set(r, tmp%is_not_empty())
      tmp = a(l)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l + 1))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r))
      tmp = tmp%get(l + 1, r + 1)
      call dpr(r)%set(l, tmp%is_not_empty())
    end do
  end do
  j = 0
  do i = 0, n - 1
    if (dpl(0)%get(i) .and. dpr(n - 1)%get(i)) j = j + 1
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') j
end program random_tournament

module mod_bitset
  implicit none

  integer, parameter :: ADDRESS_BITS_PER_WORD = 6
  integer, parameter :: BITS_PER_WORD = lshift(1,ADDRESS_BITS_PER_WORD)
  integer, parameter :: BIT_INDEX_MASK = BITS_PER_WORD-1
  integer(8), parameter :: WORD_MASK = -1_8

  type t_bitset
    private
    integer(8), pointer :: words(:) => null()
    integer :: wiu = 0
    logical :: sticky = .false.
  contains
    procedure :: to_long_array => to_long_array
    procedure :: flip => flip
    procedure :: set => set
    procedure :: clear => clear
    procedure :: get => get1
    procedure :: subset => get2
    procedure :: next_set_bit => next_set_bit
    procedure :: next_clear_bit => next_clear_bit
    procedure :: prev_set_bit => prev_set_bit
    procedure :: prev_clear_bit => prev_clear_bit
    procedure :: length => length
    procedure :: is_empty => is_empty
    procedure :: intersects => intersects
    procedure :: cardinality => cardinality
    procedure :: and => bitset_and
    procedure :: or => bitset_or
    procedure :: xor => bitset_xor
    procedure :: and_not => bitset_and_not
    procedure :: hashcode => bitset_hashcode
    procedure :: size => size_of
  end type

  interface bitset
    module procedure :: new_bitset0, new_bitset1, value_of1
  end interface bitset

contains

  integer function word_index(idx)
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    word_index = rshift(idx,ADDRESS_BITS_PER_WORD)
  end

  subroutine check_invariants(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    if (this%wiu == 0 .and. .not.associated(this%words)) return
    if (this%wiu > 1 .and. this%words(this%wiu-1) == 0_8) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Internal error (1) at check_invariants"
    end if
    if (this%wiu < 0 .or. this%wiu > size(this%words,1)) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Internal error (2) at check_invariants"
    end if
    if (this%wiu < size(this%words,1) .and. this%words(this%wiu) /= 0_8) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Internal error (3) at check_invariants"
    end if
  end

  subroutine recalculate_wiu(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer :: i
    i = this%wiu-1
    do while (i >= 0)
      if (this%words(i) /= 0_8) exit
      i = i-1
    end do
    this%wiu = i+1
  end

  function new_bitset0() result(ret)
    type(t_bitset) :: ret
    call init_words(ret,BITS_PER_WORD)
    ret%sticky = .false.
  end

  function new_bitset1(n) result(ret)
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    type(t_bitset) :: ret
    if (n < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Negative array size (n < 0) at init_bitset"
      stop
    end if
    call init_words(ret,n)
    ret%sticky = .true.
  end

  subroutine init_words(this,n)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    if (associated(this%words)) deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:word_index(n-1)))
    this%words = 0_8
  end

  function new_bitset2(words) result(ret)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: words(:)
    integer :: n
    type(t_bitset) :: ret
    n = size(words,1)
    allocate(ret%words(0:n-1))
    ret%words(0:n-1) = words(1:n)
    ret%wiu = n
    call check_invariants(ret)
  end

  function value_of1(arr) result(ret)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: arr(:)
    integer :: n
    type(t_bitset) :: ret
    n = size(arr)
    do while (n > 0 .and. arr(n) == 0_8)
      n = n-1
    end do
    if (n == 0) return
    ret = new_bitset2(arr(1:n))
  end

  function to_long_array(this) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer(8) :: ret(0:this%wiu-1)
    ret(0:this%wiu-1) = this%words(0:this%wiu-1)
  end

  subroutine ensure_capacity(this,require)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: require
    integer :: n, request
    integer, allocatable :: tmp(:)
    if (.not.associated(this%words)) then
      allocate(this%words(0:require-1))
      this%sticky = .false.
      return
    end if
    n = size(this%words,1)
    if (n >= require) return
    request = max(2*n,require)
    allocate(tmp(n))
    tmp(1:n) = this%words(0:n-1)
    deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:request-1))
    this%words = 0_8
    this%words(0:n-1) = tmp(1:n)
    this%sticky = .false.
  end

  subroutine expand_to(this,widx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: widx
    integer :: require
    require = widx+1
    if (this%wiu < require) then
      call ensure_capacity(this,require)
      this%wiu = require
    end if
  end

  subroutine check_range(fidx,tidx)
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, tidx
    if (fidx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (fidx < 0) at check_range"
    end if
    if (tidx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (fidx < 0) at check_range"
    end if
    if (fidx > tidx) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (fidx > tidx) at check_range"
    end if
  end

  subroutine flip(this,fidx,tidx)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx
    integer, optional :: tidx
    if (present(tidx)) then
      call flip2(this,fidx,tidx)
    else
      call flip1(this,fidx)
    end if
  end

  subroutine flip1(this,idx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: widx
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at flip1"
    end if
    widx = word_index(idx)
    call expand_to(this,widx)
    this%words(widx) = xor(this%words(widx),lshift(1_8,idx))
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine flip2(this,fidx,tidx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, tidx
    integer :: sidx, eidx, i
    integer(8) :: fmask, lmask
    call check_range(fidx,tidx)
    if (fidx == tidx) return
    sidx = word_index(fidx)
    eidx = word_index(tidx-1)
    call expand_to(this,eidx)
    fmask = lshift(WORD_MASK,fidx)
    lmask = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-tidx))
    if (sidx == eidx) then
      this%words(sidx) = xor(this%words(sidx),and(fmask,lmask))
    else
      this%words(sidx) = xor(this%words(sidx),fmask)
      do i = sidx+1, eidx-1
        this%words(i) = xor(this%words(i),WORD_MASK)
      end do
      this%words(eidx) = xor(this%words(eidx),lmask)
    end if
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine set(this,fidx,tidx,val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx
    integer, optional :: tidx
    logical, optional :: val
    if (present(val)) then
      if (present(tidx)) then
        call set2a(this,fidx,tidx,val)
      else
        call set1a(this,fidx,val)
      end if
    else
      if (present(tidx)) then
        call set2(this,fidx,tidx)
      else
        call set1(this,fidx)
      end if
    end if
  end

  subroutine set1(this,idx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: widx
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at set1"
    end if
    widx = word_index(idx)
    call expand_to(this,widx)
    this%words(widx) = ibset(this%words(widx),idx)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine set1a(this,idx,val)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set1(this,idx)
    else
      call clear1(this,idx)
    end if
  end

  subroutine set2(this,fidx,tidx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, tidx
    integer :: sidx, eidx, i
    integer(8) :: fmask, lmask
    call check_range(fidx,tidx)
    if (fidx == tidx) return
    sidx = word_index(fidx)
    eidx = word_index(tidx-1)
    call expand_to(this,eidx)
    fmask = lshift(WORD_MASK,fidx)
    lmask = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-tidx))
    if (sidx == eidx) then
      this%words(sidx) = or(this%words(sidx),and(fmask,lmask))
    else
      this%words(sidx) = or(this%words(sidx),fmask)
      do i = sidx+1, eidx-1
        this%words(i) = WORD_MASK
      end do
      this%words(eidx) = or(this%words(eidx),lmask)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine set2a(this,fidx,tidx,val)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, tidx
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set2(this,fidx,tidx)
    else
      call clear2(this,fidx,tidx)
    end if
  end

  subroutine clear(this,fidx,tidx)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, optional :: fidx, tidx
    if (present(fidx)) then
      if (present(tidx)) then
        call clear2(this,fidx,tidx)
      else
        call clear1(this,fidx)
      end if
    else
      call clear3(this)
    end if
  end

  subroutine clear1(this,idx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: widx
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at clear1"
    end if
    widx = word_index(idx)
    if (widx >= this%wiu) return
    this%words(widx) = ibclr(this%words(widx),idx)
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear2(this,fidx,toidx)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, toidx
    integer :: sidx, eidx, i, tidx
    integer(8) :: fmask, lmask
    tidx = toidx
    call check_range(fidx,tidx)
    if (fidx == tidx) return
    sidx = word_index(fidx)
    if (sidx >= this%wiu) return
    eidx = word_index(tidx-1)
    if (eidx >= this%wiu) then
      tidx = length(this)
      eidx = this%wiu-1
    end if
    fmask = lshift(WORD_MASK,fidx)
    lmask = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-tidx))
    if (sidx == eidx) then
      this%words(sidx) = and(this%words(sidx),not(and(fmask,lmask)))
    else
      this%words(sidx) = and(this%words(sidx),not(fmask))
      do i = sidx+1, eidx-1
        this%words(i) = 0_8
      end do
      this%words(eidx) = and(this%words(eidx),not(lmask))
    end if
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear3(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    this%words(0:this%wiu-1) = 0_8
  end

  function get1(this,idx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: widx
    logical :: ret
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at get1"
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    widx = word_index(idx)
    ret = widx < this%wiu .and. btest(this%words(widx),idx)
  end

  function get2(this,fidx,toidx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: fidx, toidx
    integer :: tar, src, i, tidx, l
    integer(8) :: lmask, tmp
    type(t_bitset) :: ret
    logical :: align
    tidx = toidx
    call check_range(fidx,tidx)
    call check_invariants(this)
    l = length(this)
    if (l <= fidx .or. fidx == tidx) return
    if (tidx > l) tidx = l
    ret = new_bitset1(tidx-fidx)
    tar = word_index(tidx-fidx-1)+1
    src = word_index(fidx)
    if (and(fidx,BIT_INDEX_MASK) == 0) then
      do i = 0, tar-2
        ret%words(i) = this%words(src)
        src = src+1
      end do
    else
      do i = 0, tar-2
        tmp = rshift(this%words(src),fidx)
        if (this%words(src) < 0_8) tmp = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-fidx))
        ret%words(i) = or(tmp,lshift(this%words(src+1),fidx))
        src = src+1
      end do
    end if
    lmask = WORD_MASK
    if (tidx /= 0) lmask = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-tidx))
    if (and(tidx-1,BIT_INDEX_MASK) < and(fidx,BIT_INDEX_MASK)) then
      tmp = rshift(this%words(src),fidx)
      if (this%words(src) < 0_8) tmp = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-fidx))
      ret%words(tar-1) = or(tmp,lshift(and(this%words(src+1),lmask),-fidx))
    else
      tmp = and(this%words(src),lmask)
      if (tmp < 0_8) then
        tmp = not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-fidx))
      else
        tmp = rshift(tmp,fidx)
      end if
      ret%words(tar-1) = and(tmp,lmask)
    end if
    ret%wiu = tar
    call recalculate_wiu(ret)
    call check_invariants(ret)
  end

  function num_of_trailing_zeros(n) result(ret)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: n
    integer :: ret, x, y
    ret = 64
    if (n == 0_8) return
    ret = 63
    y = int(n,4)
    if (y /= 0) then
      ret = ret-32
      x = y
    else
      x = int(rshift(n,32),4)
    end if
    y = lshift(x,16)
    if (y /= 0) then
      ret = ret-16
      x = y
    end if
    y = lshift(x,8)
    if (y /= 0) then
      ret = ret-8
      x = y
    end if
    y = lshift(x,4)
    if (y /= 0) then
      ret = ret-4
      x = y
    end if
    y = lshift(x,2)
    if (y /= 0) then
      ret = ret-2
      x = y
    end if
    ret = ret-rshift(lshift(x,1),31)
  end

  function num_of_leading_zeros(n) result(ret)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: n
    integer :: ret, x
    ret = 64
    if (n == 0_8) return
    ret = 1
    x = int(rshift(n,32),4)
    if (x == 0) then
      ret = ret+32
      x = int(n,4)
    end if
    if (rshift(x,16) == 0) then
      ret = ret+16
      x = lshift(x,16)
    end if
    if (rshift(x,24) == 0) then
      ret = ret+8
      x = lshift(x,8)
    end if
    if (rshift(x,28) == 0) then
      ret = ret+4
      x = lshift(x,4)
    end if
    if (rshift(x,30) == 0) then
      ret = ret+2
      x = lshift(x,2)
    end if
    ret = ret-rshift(x,31)
  end

  function next_set_bit(this,idx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: ret, u
    integer(8) :: word
    ret = -1
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at next_set_bit"
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = word_index(idx)
    if (u >= this%wiu) return
    word = and(this%words(u),lshift(WORD_MASK,idx))
    do
      if (word /= 0_8) then
        ret = u*BITS_PER_WORD+num_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u+1
      if (u == this%wiu) return
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  function next_clear_bit(this,idx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: ret, u
    integer(8) :: word
    ret = idx
    if (idx < 0) then
      write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at next_set_bit"
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = word_index(idx)
    if (u >= this%wiu) return
    word = and(not(this%words(u)),lshift(WORD_MASK,idx))
    do
      if (word /= 0_8) then
        ret = u*BITS_PER_WORD+num_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u+1
      if (u == this%wiu) then
        ret = this%wiu*BITS_PER_WORD
        return
      end if
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  function prev_set_bit(this,idx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: ret, u
    integer(8) :: word
    ret = -1
    if (idx < 0) then
      if (idx /= -1) write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at next_set_bit"
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = word_index(idx)
    if (u >= this%wiu) then
      ret = length(this)-1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u),not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-(idx+1))))
    do
      if (word /= 0_8) then
        ret = (u+1)*BITS_PER_WORD-1-num_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) return
      u = u-1
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  function prev_clear_bit(this,idx) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: idx
    integer :: ret, u
    integer(8) :: word
    ret = -1
    if (idx < 0) then
      if (idx /= -1) write(*,'(a)') "Error: Index out of bounds (idx < 0) at next_set_bit"
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = word_index(idx)
    if (u >= this%wiu) then
      ret = idx
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)),not(lshift(WORD_MASK,-(idx+1))))
    do
      if (word /= 0_8) then
        ret = (u+1)*BITS_PER_WORD-1-num_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) return
      u = u-1
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end

  integer function length(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    length = 0
    if (this%wiu == 0) return
    length = BITS_PER_WORD*(this%wiu-1)+BITS_PER_WORD-num_of_leading_zeros(this%words(this%wiu-1))
  end

  logical function is_empty(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    is_empty = this%wiu == 0
  end

  function intersects(this,other) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    logical :: ret
    integer :: i
    ret = .false.
    do i = min(this%wiu,other%wiu)-1, 0, -1
      if (and(this%words(i),other%words(i)) /= 0_8) then
        ret = .true.
      end if
    end do
  end

  integer function cardinality(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: i
    cardinality = 0
    do i = 0, this%wiu-1
      cardinality = cardinality+popcnt(this%words(i))
    end do
  end

  function bitset_eq(this,other) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    logical :: ret
    ret = .false.
    if (this%wiu /= other%wiu) return
    do i = 0, this%wiu-1
      if (this%words(i) /= other%words(i)) return
    end do
    ret = .true.
  end

  subroutine bitset_and(this,other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    if (bitset_eq(this,other)) return
    do while (this%wiu > other%wiu)
      this%wiu = this%wiu-1
      this%words(this%wiu) = 0_8
    end do
    do i = 0, this%wiu-1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i),other%words(i))
    end do
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine bitset_or(this,other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i, same
    if (bitset_eq(this,other)) return
    same = min(this%wiu,other%wiu)
    if (this%wiu < other%wiu) then
      call ensure_capacity(this,other%wiu)
      this%wiu = other%wiu
    end if
    do i = 0, same-1
      this%words(i) = or(this%words(i),other%words(i))
    end do
    if (same < other%wiu) then
      this%words(same:other%wiu-1) = other%words(same:other%wiu-1)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine bitset_xor(this,other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i, same
    same = min(this%wiu,other%wiu)
    if (this%wiu < other%wiu) then
      call ensure_capacity(this,other%wiu)
      this%wiu = other%wiu
    end if
    do i = 0, same-1
      this%words(i) = xor(this%words(i),other%words(i))
    end do
    if (same < other%wiu) then
      this%words(same:other%wiu-1) = other%words(same:other%wiu-1)
    end if
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine bitset_and_not(this,other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    do i = min(this%wiu,other%wiu)-1, 0, -1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i),not(other%words(i)))
    end do
    call recalculate_wiu(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  function bitset_hashcode(this) result(ret)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer(8) :: h
    integer :: ret, i
    h = 1234_8
    do i = this%wiu-1, 0, -1
      h = xor(h,this%words(i)*int(i+1,8))
    end do
    ret = int(xor(lshift(h,32),h),4)
  end

  integer function size_of(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    size_of = size(this%words,1)*BITS_PER_WORD
  end
end module mod_bitset

program random_tournament
  use mod_bitset
  implicit none
  type(t_bitset) :: a(0:2000), dpl(0:2000), dpr(0:2000), tmp
  integer :: n, i, j, l, r
  character(2000) :: s
  read(*,*) n
  do i = 0, n-1
    call dpl(i)%set(i)
    call dpr(i)%set(i)
    if (i == 0) cycle
    read(*,*) s
    do j = 0, i-1
      call a(i)%set(j,val=s(j+1:j+1) == "1")
      call a(j)%set(i,val=s(j+1:j+1) == "0")
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n-1
    do l = 0, n-1-i
      r = l+i
      tmp = a(r)%subset(0,n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r-1))
      tmp = tmp%subset(l,r)
      call dpl(l)%set(r,val=.not.tmp%is_empty())
      tmp = a(l)%subset(0,n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l+1))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r))
      tmp = tmp%subset(l+1,r+1)
      call dpr(r)%set(l,val=.not.tmp%is_empty())
    end do
  end do
  j = 0
  do i = 0, n-1
    if (dpl(0)%get(i) .and. dpr(n-1)%get(i)) j = j+1
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') j
end program random_tournament

module mod_bitset
  implicit none
  integer, private, parameter :: address_bits_per_word = 6
  integer, private, parameter :: bits_per_word = lshift(1, address_bits_per_word)
  integer, private, parameter :: bit_index_mask = bits_per_word - 1
  integer(8), private, parameter :: word_mask = -1

  type t_bitset
    integer(8), private, allocatable :: words(:) ! 0-indexed, [start, end)
    integer, private :: words_in_use = 0
  contains
    procedure, private :: flip0
    procedure, private :: flip1
    generic :: flip => flip0, flip1
    procedure, private :: set0
    procedure, private :: set1
    procedure, private :: setval0
    procedure, private :: setval1
    generic :: set => set0, set1, setval0, setval1
    procedure, private :: clear0
    procedure, private :: clear1
    procedure, private :: clear2
    generic :: clear => clear0, clear1, clear2
    procedure, private :: get0
    procedure, private :: get1
    generic :: get => get0, get1
    procedure :: next_set_bit => next_set_bit
    procedure :: next_clear_bit => next_clear_bit
    procedure :: previous_set_bit => previous_set_bit
    procedure :: previous_clear_bit => previous_clear_bit
    procedure :: length => length
    procedure :: is_empty => is_empty
    procedure :: is_not_empty => is_not_empty
    procedure :: intersects => intersects
    procedure :: cardinality => cardinality
    procedure :: and => and0
    procedure :: or => or0
    procedure :: xor => xor0
    procedure :: and_not => and_not0
    procedure :: size => size0
  end type

  interface bitset
    module procedure :: newb0, newb3
  end interface bitset

  interface slshift
    module procedure :: slshift0, slshift1
  end interface slshift

  interface urshift
    module procedure :: urshift0, urshift1
  end interface urshift

contains

  integer function slshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end

  integer(8) function slshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    res = lshift(i, m)
  end

  integer function urshift0(i, n) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 31)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 31), m - 1)
    end if
  end

  integer(8) function urshift1(i, n) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: m
    m = and(n, 63)
    if (m == 0) then
      res = i
    else
      res = rshift(ibclr(rshift(i, 1), 63), m - 1)
    end if
  end

  integer function number_of_leading_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 1
    x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    if (x == 0) then
      res = res + 32
      x = int(i)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 16) == 0) then
      res = res + 16
      x = lshift(x, 16)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 24) == 0) then
      res = res + 8
      x = lshift(x, 8)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 28) == 0) then
      res = res + 4
      x = lshift(x, 4)
    end if
    if (urshift(x, 30) == 0) then
      res = res + 2
      x = lshift(x, 2)
    end if
    res = res - urshift(x, 31)
  end

  integer function number_of_trailing_zeros(i) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: i
    integer :: x, y
    if (i == 0) then
      res = 64
      return
    end if
    res = 63
    y = int(i)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 32
      x = y
    else
      x = int(urshift(i, 32))
    end if
    y = lshift(x, 16)
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 16
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 8
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 4
      x = y
    end if
    if (y /= 0) then
      res = res - 2
      x = y
    end if
    res = res - urshift(lshift(x, 1), 31)
  end

  integer function words_index(bit_index) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    res = rshift(bit_index, address_bits_per_word)
  end

  subroutine assert(flag, message)
    logical, intent(in) :: flag
    character(*), intent(in), optional :: message
    if (flag) return
    write(*,*) "*** Error occurred ***"
    if (present(message)) write(*,'(a)') message
    stop
  end

  subroutine check_invariants(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    n = size(this%words)
    if (u /= 0) call assert(this%words(u - 1) /= 0, "At check_invariants() (1)")
    call assert(u >= 0 .and. u <= n, "At check_invariants() (2)")
    if (u /= n) call assert(this%words(u) == 0, "At check_invariants() (3)")
  end

  subroutine recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer :: i
    do i = this%words_in_use - 1, 0, -1
      if (this%words(i) /= 0) then
        this%words_in_use = i + 1
        return
      end if
    end do
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end

  subroutine init_words(this, nbits)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    if (allocated(this%words)) deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:words_index(nbits - 1)))
    this%words = 0
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb0() result(res)
    call init_words(res, bits_per_word)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb1(nbits) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: nbits
    call assert(nbits >= 0, "nbits < 0 at newb1()")
    call init_words(res, nbits)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb2(words) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: words(:)
    allocate(res%words(0:size(words) - 1))
    res%words = words
    res%words_in_use = size(words)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end

  type(t_bitset) function newb3(longs) result(res)
    integer(8), intent(in) :: longs(:)
    integer :: i
    do i = size(longs), 1, -1
      if (longs(i) /= 0) then
        res = newb2(longs(1:i))
        return
      end if
    end do
    res = newb0()
  end

  subroutine ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: words_required
    integer :: request
    integer(8), allocatable :: copy(:)
    if (size(this%words) >= words_required) return
    request = max(2 * size(this%words), words_required)
    allocate(copy(size(this%words)))
    copy = this%words
    deallocate(this%words)
    allocate(this%words(0:request - 1))
    this%words = 0
    this%words(0:size(copy) - 1) = copy
  end

  subroutine expand_to(this, word_index)
    type(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: word_index
    integer :: words_required
    words_required = word_index + 1
    if (this%words_in_use < words_required) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, words_required)
      this%words_in_use = words_required
    end if
  end

  subroutine check_range(from_index, to_index)
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    call assert(0 <= from_index .and. from_index <= to_index, "At check_range()")
  end

  subroutine flip0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at flip0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = xor(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine flip1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)

    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), word_mask)
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = xor(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if

    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine set0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at set0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    call expand_to(this, word_index)
    this%words(word_index) = or(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index))
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear0(this, bit_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at clear0()")
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) return
    this%words(word_index) = and(this%words(word_index), not(slshift(1_8, bit_index)))
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine setval0(this, bit_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set0(this, bit_index)
    else
      call clear0(this, bit_index)
    end if
  end

  subroutine set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    call expand_to(this, end_word_index)

    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), first_word_mask)

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = word_mask
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = or(this%words(idx), last_word_mask)
    end if

    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine clear1(this, from_index, to_index_)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index
    integer :: start_word_index, end_word_index, idx
    integer(8) :: first_word_mask, last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    if (from_index == to_index) return

    start_word_index = words_index(from_index)
    if (start_word_index >= this%words_in_use) return

    end_word_index = words_index(to_index - 1)
    if (end_word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      to_index = length(this)
      end_word_index = this%words_in_use - 1
    end if

    first_word_mask = slshift(word_mask, from_index)
    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (start_word_index == end_word_index) then
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(and(first_word_mask, last_word_mask)))
    else
      idx = start_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(first_word_mask))

      do idx = start_word_index + 1, end_word_index - 1
        this%words(idx) = 0
      end do

      idx = end_word_index
      this%words(idx) = and(this%words(idx), not(last_word_mask))
    end if

    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine setval1(this, from_index, to_index, val)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index
    logical, intent(in) :: val
    if (val) then
      call set1(this, from_index, to_index)
    else
      call clear1(this, from_index, to_index)
    end if
  end

  subroutine clear2(this)
    class(t_bitset), intent(out) :: this
    this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1) = 0
    this%words_in_use = 0
  end

  logical function get0(this, bit_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: bit_index
    integer :: word_index
    call assert(bit_index >= 0, "bit_index < 0 at get0()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    word_index = words_index(bit_index)
    if (word_index >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = .false.
      return
    end if
    res = and(this%words(word_index), slshift(1_8, bit_index)) /= 0
  end

  type(t_bitset) function get1(this, from_index, to_index_) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index, to_index_
    integer :: to_index, len
    integer :: target_words, source_index, idx
    logical :: word_aligned
    integer(8) :: last_word_mask
    to_index = to_index_

    call check_range(from_index, to_index)
    call check_invariants(this)
    len = length(this)
    if (len <= from_index .or. from_index == to_index) then
      res = newb0()
      return
    end if

    if (to_index > len) to_index = len
    res = newb1(to_index - from_index)
    target_words = words_index(to_index - from_index - 1) + 1
    source_index = words_index(from_index)
    word_aligned = and(from_index, bit_index_mask) == 0

    do idx = 0, target_words - 2
      if (word_aligned) then
        res%words(idx) = this%words(source_index)
      else
        res%words(idx) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), slshift(this%words(source_index + 1), -from_index))
      end if
      source_index = source_index + 1
    end do

    last_word_mask = urshift(word_mask, -to_index)
    if (and(to_index - 1, bit_index_mask) < and(from_index, bit_index_mask)) then
      res%words(target_words - 1) = or(urshift(this%words(source_index), from_index), &
        slshift(and(this%words(source_index + 1), last_word_mask), -from_index))
    else
      res%words(target_words - 1) = urshift(and(this%words(source_index), last_word_mask), from_index)
    end if

    res%words_in_use = target_words
    call recalculate_words_in_use(res)
    call check_invariants(res)
  end

  integer function next_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
