    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_set_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), slshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  integer function next_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    call assert(from_index >= 0, "from_index < 0 at next_clear_bit()")
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), slshift(word_mask, from_index))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u * bits_per_word) + number_of_trailing_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      u = u + 1
      if (u == this%words_in_use) then
        res = this%words_in_use * bits_per_word
        return
      end if
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end

  integer function previous_set_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_set_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = length(this) - 1
      return
    end if
    word = and(this%words(u), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = this%words(u)
    end do
  end

  integer function previous_clear_bit(this, from_index) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer, intent(in) :: from_index
    integer :: u
    integer(8) :: word
    if (from_index < 0) then
      call assert(from_index == -1, "from_index < -1 at previous_clear_bit()")
      res = -1
      return
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
    u = words_index(from_index)
    if (u >= this%words_in_use) then
      res = from_index
      return
    end if
    word = and(not(this%words(u)), urshift(word_mask, -(from_index + 1)))
    do
      if (word /= 0) then
        res = (u + 1) * bits_per_word - 1 - number_of_leading_zeros(word)
        return
      end if
      if (u == 0) then
        res = -1
        return
      end if
      u = u - 1
      word = not(this%words(u))
    end do
  end

  integer function length(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    integer :: u, n
    u = this%words_in_use
    if (u == 0) then
      res = 0
    else
      n = number_of_leading_zeros(this%words(u - 1))
      res = bits_per_word * (u - 1) + (bits_per_word - n)
    end if
  end

  logical function is_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use == 0
  end

  logical function is_not_empty(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = this%words_in_use > 0
  end

  logical function intersects(this, other) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: m, i
    m = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = m, 0, -1
      if (and(this%words(i), other%words(i)) /= 0) then
        res = .true.
      end if
    end do
    res = .false.
  end

  integer function cardinality(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = sum(popcnt(this%words(0:this%words_in_use - 1)))
  end

  subroutine and0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: i
    do while (this%words_in_use > other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(this%words_in_use) = 0
    end do
    do i = 0, this%words_in_use - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine or0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = or(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine xor0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = xor(this%words(i), other%words(i))
    end do
    if (u < other%words_in_use) then
      call ensure_capacity(this, other%words_in_use)
      this%words_in_use = other%words_in_use
      this%words(u:this%words_in_use - 1) = other%words(u:other%words_in_use - 1)
    end if
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  subroutine and_not0(this, other)
    class(t_bitset), intent(inout) :: this
    type(t_bitset), intent(in) :: other
    integer :: u, i
    u = min(this%words_in_use, other%words_in_use)
    do i = 0, u - 1
      this%words(i) = and(this%words(i), not(other%words(i)))
    end do
    call recalculate_words_in_use(this)
    call check_invariants(this)
  end

  integer function size0(this) result(res)
    class(t_bitset), intent(in) :: this
    res = size(this%words) * bits_per_word
  end

end module mod_bitset
program random_tournament
  use mod_bitset
  implicit none
  type(t_bitset) :: a(0:2000), dpl(0:2000), dpr(0:2000), tmp
  integer :: n, i, j, l, r
  character(2000) :: s
  read(*,*) n
  do i = 0, n - 1
    a(i) = bitset()
    dpl(i) = bitset()
    dpr(i) = bitset()
    call dpl(i)%set(i)
    call dpr(i)%set(i)
  end do
  do i = 1, n - 1
    read(*,'(a)') s
    do j = 0, i - 1
      call a(i)%set(j, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '1')
      call a(j)%set(i, s(j + 1:j + 1) == '0')
    end do
  end do
  do i = 1, n - 1
    do l = 0, n - i - 1
      r = l + i
      tmp = a(r)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r - 1))
      tmp = tmp%get(l, r)
      call dpl(l)%set(r, tmp%is_not_empty())
      tmp = a(l)%get(0, n)
      call tmp%and(dpl(l + 1))
      call tmp%and(dpr(r))
      tmp = tmp%get(l + 1, r + 1)
      call dpr(r)%set(l, tmp%is_not_empty())
    end do
  end do
  j = 0
  do i = 0, n - 1
    if (dpl(0)%get(i) .and. dpr(n - 1)%get(i)) j = j + 1
  end do
  write(*,'(i0)') j
end program random_tournament

def LI(): return [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
def LI_(): return [int(x) - 1 for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
def LF(): return [float(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
def LS(): return sys.stdin.readline().split()
def II(): return int(sys.stdin.readline())
def SI(): return input()

def main():
    tab = {'0': '1', '1': '0'}
    N = II()
    A = [['0'] * N for _ in range(N)]
    for i in range(1, N):
        s = SI()
        for j, aa in enumerate(s):
            A[i][j] = aa
            A[j][i] = tab[aa]
    for i in range(N):
        A[i] = int(''.join(A[i])[::-1], 2)
    dpl = [int('1' * N, 2) for _ in range(N)]
    dpr = [int('1' * N, 2) for _ in range(N)]
    for sub in range(1, N):
        for i in range(N - sub):
            j = i + sub
            winr = A[i] & dpl[i + 1] & dpr[j]
            winr = (winr >> (i + 1)) & ((1 << sub) - 1)
            dpr[j] -= (0 if winr else 1) << i
            winl = A[j] & dpl[i] & dpr[j - 1]
            winl = (winl >> i) & ((1 << sub) - 1)
            dpl[i] -= (0 if winl else 1) << j

    ans = bin(dpl[0] & dpr[N - 1]).count('1')
    return ans
